data.message: This is the reason i dont listen to new eminem. Slim shady at his finest would never tour with rihanna. I just saw a #tbt picture of dre em snoop and ice cube from the up in smoke tour. Thats a real slim shady tour. Not a tour based on one overrated overplayed song. This is literally the equivalent of eminem touring with dido based on the success of Stan. It does not make sense

replies.message: He can do whatever he wants to, as you said: He started the rapper/singer trend with dido and every album had one signature song with female singer - it basicaly makes all sense
